title: Check Staff Credentials at Entry
description: A person is trying to enter through a staff entrance but their credential will not scan.

tasks.description: Ask for the person's name and ID.
Check the master staff list for the event to see if the person is scheduled to work.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the person is on the schedule.

tasks.description: Verify that their credential is valid and active in the credentialing system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the credential was accidentally deactivated and reactivates it.

tasks.description: Allow the staff member to enter.
tasks.expected_outcome: The staff member is granted access.
